channel.description: Plan your app’s sign-out experience Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: Delete intro and definitions of IdP Session and Application Session. Add new introduction Links to original docs: ‘+ https://developer.okta.com/docs/concepts/session/ (Examples of sign-out experiences onwards) Structure type: Concept Content type: Explanation Explanations present a more detailed dive into a single topic compared to Conceptual Overviews. They aim to clarify specific elements of the technology, offering developers practical insights or in-depth clarification on particular points of interest.
